name: EcoSense Solutions
description: EcoSense develops innovative sensors and monitoring systems to help agricultural businesses track environmental conditions and optimize resource usage.

name: MedTrack
description: A patient-centered healthcare platform that connects rural communities with medical specialists through telemedicine and tracks health metrics for better outcomes.

name: Get Sparkage
description:
Company Name: Sparkage Inc.

Founded: 2016

Founders: Tyler Robertson, Drew Lederman, Ryan M. Lederman

Headquarters: Boise, Idaho (Boise metro)

Contact Information:

Email: support@getsparkage.com

Phone: (800) 210-0562 (Mon–Fri, 8am–5pm MST)

Address: 1361 E. Pineridge Dr., Boise, ID 83716

Overview:

Sparkage Inc. is a Boise-based software-as-a-service (SaaS) company that specializes in digital customer loyalty and engagement solutions for local businesses. The company provides tools that help merchants drive repeat visits and customer referrals through mobile-first technology.

Products and Services:

Sparkage offers a range of digital marketing tools designed to support local retailers such as restaurants and salons. Key features include:

- Mobile wallet–integrated loyalty cards and digital coupons
- Automated customer referral rewards
- Geo-fenced push notifications
- A merchant analytics dashboard

Mission and Vision:

Sparkage supports the 'buy local' movement by equipping small businesses with accessible and effective growth tools. The platform is designed to enhance community-based commerce and promote local economic development.

Business Model and Status:

Sparkage operates as a privately held company with no public funding disclosed, suggesting it may be self-funded or bootstrapped. There are no known high-profile partnerships or customers publicly listed. The company focuses on serving small, local merchants seeking user-friendly loyalty solutions.
